00041 CBibleReadWindow::CBibleReadWindow(ListCSwordModuleInfo moduleList, CMDIArea* parent, const char *name ) : CLexiconReadWindow(moduleList, parent,name) {
00042     if (CSwordBibleModuleInfo* bible = dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(moduleList.first())) {
00043         if (bible->hasTestament(CSwordBibleModuleInfo::OldTestament))
00044             key()->key("Genesis 1:1");
00045         else
00046             key()->key("Matthew 1:1");
00047     }
00048 }
00049 
00050 CBibleReadWindow::~CBibleReadWindow(){
00051 }
00052 
00053 void CBibleReadWindow::applyProfileSettings( CProfileWindow* const settings ) {
00054     CLexiconReadWindow::applyProfileSettings(settings);
00055 
00056     const int count = displaySettingsButton()->menuItemCount();
00057     int result = 0;
00058     //now check every item
00059     for (int i = 1; i < count; i++) { //first item is a title
00060         if (displaySettingsButton()->itemStatus(i)) //item is checked
00061             result += (int)pow(2,i-1);//add 2^i (the i. digit in binary)
00062     }
00063     settings->setWindowSettings(result);
00064 };
00065 
00066 void CBibleReadWindow::storeProfileSettings( CProfileWindow* const settings ) {
00067     CLexiconReadWindow::storeProfileSettings(settings);
00068 
00069   int result = settings->windowSettings();
00070     const int count = displaySettingsButton()->menuItemCount();
00071     for (int i = count-1; i>=1; i--) {
00072         if (result-(int)pow(2,i-1)>= 0) { //2^i was added before, so item with index i is set
00073             result -= (int)pow(2,i-1);
00074             displaySettingsButton()->setItemStatus(i,true);
00075         }
00076         else
00077             displaySettingsButton()->setItemStatus(i,false);            
00078     }       
00079     displaySettingsButton()->setChanged();
00080 };

00084 void CBibleReadWindow::insertKeyboardActions( KAccel* const a ){
00085   a->insert("Next book",        i18n("Next book"),        "", IDK_PRESENTER_NEXT_BOOK,        0, "");
00086     a->insert("Previous book",    i18n("Previous book"),    "", IDK_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_BOOK,    0, "");
00087     a->insert("Next chapter",     i18n("Next chapter"),     "", IDK_PRESENTER_NEXT_CHAPTER,     0, "");
00088     a->insert("Previous chapter", i18n("Previous chapter"), "", IDK_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_CHAPTER, 0, ""); 
00089     a->insert("Next verse",       i18n("Next verse"),       "", IDK_PRESENTER_NEXT_VERSE,       0, "");
00090     a->insert("Previous verse",   i18n("Previous verse"),   "", IDK_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_VERSE,   0, ""); 
00091 }

00093 
00094 void CBibleReadWindow::initKeyboardActions() {
00095   CReadWindow::initKeyboardActions();
00096 
00097   CBTConfig::setupAccel( CBTConfig::bibleWindow, accel() ); 
00098   insertKeyboardActions( accel() );
00099 
00100   accel()->readSettings();
00101 
00102     accel()->setSlot("Next book", this, SLOT(nextBook()));
00103   accel()->setSlot("Previous book", this, SLOT(previousBook()));
00104   accel()->setSlot("Next chapter", this, SLOT(nextChapter()));      
00105   accel()->setSlot("Previous chapter", this, SLOT(previousChapter()));  
00106   accel()->setSlot("Next verse", this, SLOT(nextVerse()));      
00107   accel()->setSlot("Previous verse", this, SLOT(previousVerse()));  
00108 }

00112 }

00114 void CBibleReadWindow::initView(){
00115     qWarning("CBibleWindow::initView");
00116     CLexiconReadWindow::initView();
00117     
00118   setDisplaySettingsButton( new CDisplaySettingsButton( &displayOptions(), &filterOptions(), modules(), mainToolBar()) );
00119     mainToolBar()->insertWidget(1,displaySettingsButton()->size().width(),displaySettingsButton());
00120 }

00123 void CBibleReadWindow::lookup( CSwordKey* newKey ){
00124     qWarning("CBibleReadWindow::lookup( CSwordKey* newKey )");
00125     CLexiconReadWindow::lookup(newKey);
00126 
00127   if (CSwordVerseKey* vk = dynamic_cast<CSwordVerseKey*>(newKey))
00128         displayWidget()->moveToAnchor( QString::number(vk->Verse()) );
00129 }

00132 void CBibleReadWindow::setupPopupMenu(){
00133     popup()->insertTitle(CToolClass::getIconForModule(modules().first()), i18n("Bible window"));
00134 
00135     m_actions.selectAll = new KAction(i18n("Select all"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(selectAll()), actionCollection());
00136   m_actions.selectAll->plug(popup());
00137 
00138   (new KActionSeparator())->plug( popup() );
00139 
00140     m_actions.copyMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Copy..."), ICON_EDIT_COPY);  
00141     m_actions.copy.verseOnly = new KAction(i18n("Verse"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAnchorOnly()), actionCollection());
00142     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.verseOnly);
00143     m_actions.copy.textOnly = new KAction(i18n("Text of verse"), KShortcut(0),displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAnchorTextOnly()), actionCollection()); 
00144     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.textOnly);
00145     m_actions.copy.verseAndText = new KAction(i18n("Verse with text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAnchorWithText()), actionCollection());
00146     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.verseAndText);    
00147     m_actions.copy.chapter = new KAction(i18n("Chapter"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAll()), actionCollection());
00148     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.chapter);     
00149   m_actions.copyMenu->insert(new KActionSeparator());   
00150     m_actions.copy.selectedText = new KAction(i18n("Selected text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copySelection()),actionCollection());
00151     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.selectedText);
00152     m_actions.copyMenu->plug(popup());
00153 
00154     m_actions.saveMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Save..."),ICON_FILE_SAVE);   
00155     m_actions.save.verseAndText = new KAction(i18n("Verse with text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(saveAnchorWithText()), actionCollection());
00156     m_actions.saveMenu->insert(m_actions.save.verseAndText);
00157     m_actions.save.chapterAsPlain = new KAction(i18n("Chapter as plain text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(saveAsPlain()),actionCollection());
00158     m_actions.saveMenu->insert(m_actions.save.chapterAsPlain);
00159     m_actions.save.chapterAsHTML = new KAction(i18n("Chapter as HTML"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(saveAsHTML()),actionCollection());
00160     m_actions.saveMenu->insert(m_actions.save.chapterAsHTML);
00161     m_actions.saveMenu->plug(popup());
00162 
00163     m_actions.printMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Print..."),ICON_FILE_PRINT);    
00164     m_actions.print.verseAndText = new KAction(i18n("Verse with text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(printAnchorWithText()), actionCollection());
00165     m_actions.printMenu->insert(m_actions.print.verseAndText);  
00166   m_actions.print.chapter = new KAction(i18n("Chapter"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(printAll()),actionCollection());
00167     m_actions.printMenu->insert(m_actions.print.chapter);
00168     m_actions.printMenu->plug(popup());
00169 }

00172 void CBibleReadWindow::updatePopupMenu(){
00173     
00174   m_actions.copy.verseOnly->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );   
00175     m_actions.copy.textOnly->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );  
00176     m_actions.copy.verseAndText->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );
00177     m_actions.copy.selectedText->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasSelection() );
00178 
00179     m_actions.save.verseAndText->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );
00180     
00181   m_actions.print.verseAndText->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );
00182 }

00185 void CBibleReadWindow::nextBook(){
00186     if (verseKey()->next(CSwordVerseKey::UseBook))
00187         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00188 }
00189 
00191 void CBibleReadWindow::previousBook(){
00192     if (verseKey()->previous(CSwordVerseKey::UseBook))
00193         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00194 }
00195 
00197 void CBibleReadWindow::nextChapter(){
00198     if (verseKey()->next(CSwordVerseKey::UseChapter))
00199         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00200 }
00201 
00203 void CBibleReadWindow::previousChapter(){
00204     if (verseKey()->previous(CSwordVerseKey::UseChapter))
00205         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00206 }
00207 
00209 void CBibleReadWindow::nextVerse(){
00210     if (verseKey()->next(CSwordVerseKey::UseVerse))
00211         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00212 }
00213 
00215 void CBibleReadWindow::previousVerse(){
00216     if (verseKey()->previous(CSwordVerseKey::UseVerse))
00217         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00218 }

00221 CSwordVerseKey* CBibleReadWindow::verseKey(){
00222   qWarning("CBibleReadWindow::key()");
00223     CSwordVerseKey* k = dynamic_cast<CSwordVerseKey*>(CDisplayWindow::key());
00224     Q_ASSERT(k);
00225     return k;
00226 }
